name: places/ChIJBZNawVhYwokR84snv9eUAP0
adrFormatAddress: 1333 Broadway, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
I have a fabulous chic parka that I bought at least 10 years ago and it is not only warm but so fashionable and comfortable.  And, the quality is so outstanding that it does not even look a year old!

I wanted to purchase a longer down puffer, and had one all picked out, but there was a problem with the shopping app and my size was sold out.  I called the customer service department yesterday and the lady who helped me was able to find a coat and hold it for me until I was able to successfully complete the purchase.

This is the kind of customer service that really hardly exists any more.  I am so thrilled to have this coat and look forward to wearing it in many winters to come!

Thank you so much to Dawn Levy and team.  Happy Holidays!

originalText.text: The coat is lovely, but runs small. I have tried to use the return portal unsuccessfully. I have called the phone number on their website~ disconnected. I have sent two emails with order number included. No response. hmmm...

text.text: The coat is lovely, but runs small. I have tried to use the return portal unsuccessfully. I have called the phone number on their website~ disconnected. I have sent two emails with order number included. No response. hmmm...

originalText.text: I had the best experience with Dawn Levy. I’ve bought 2 coats and the quality and fit is really perfect. So warm, cozy and flattering. I never wore down puffer coats before this brand because I never felt good wearing them. My cloe coat gives me such a great shape. The delivery was fast, the customer service was excellent when I made an exchange on size and the packaging was so luxurious. Definitely a customer for life!

originalText.text: My wife absolutely loved the coat I bought her for our anniversary. Thank you Dawn Levy for delivering it in time! I will definitely purchase from here again!

text.text: My wife absolutely loved the coat I bought her for our anniversary. Thank you Dawn Levy for delivering it in time! I will definitely purchase from here again!

originalText.text: I love the coats!!! they fit well!! warm & comfy!! always get compliments from strangers...kinda pricy butttt u get what u pay for! and that's excellent quality from dawn levy :)
